T15TD4344E:156a-0: @156a # // na mo lo ke shva r'a ya /
T15TD4344E:156a-1: sngon rgya gar lho phyogs su bstan pa dar pa'i che /
T15TD4344E:156a-2: grong khyer chen po cig na tshong dpon gyi bu su kha de ba zhes pas longs spyod thams cad rang gis chud gsan nas shin tu sdug bsngal zhing yod pa na //
T15TD4344E:156a-3: yul der bud med cig tshad pas thebs te tsandan go shirsha min pas gso mi nus la de yang ma rnyed de sman pa thams cad kyis bor ro //
T15TD4344E:156a-4: der tshong dpon gyi bu des dris bas tsandan na de rnyed nas sos na bu mo ster zhes zer ro //
T15TD4344E:156a-5: der pha mes kyi yi dam go shirsha las byas pa'i thub pa'i sku cig yod pa bdar te nang du btang zhing phyir byugs pas sos so //
T15TD4344E:156a-6: de gnyis lhan cig gnas pa na bud med des de la 'di lta bu'i las byed pa gnyis ka dmyal bar skye'o zhes spyos //
T15TD4344E:156a-7: der tshong dpon gyi bu de de dang nye ba'i gtsug lag khang cig tu pandi ta cig la yi ge drug pa zhus nas bud med kyis g-yog byas nas gnyis ka'i don du lo bcu gnyis bsgrubs pas rmi lam du zhal gzigs te bo ta lar 'dengs zhes gsung ngo //
T15TD4344E:156a-8: khos bdag 'gro ste slob dpon la 'dri dgos zhes byas so //
T15TD4344E:156a-9: sad pa dang slob dpon dang g-yog la dris pas de deng kyi drin yin pas mi 'khrid na mi phan zhes byas pas /
T15TD4344E:156a-10: yang sgrub pa yun ring du byas te bcom ldan 'das byon nas gsum char po ta lar khrid do //
T15TD4344E:156a-11: su kha de bas smras pa /
T15TD4344E:156a-12: ltos shig sngags kyi nus pa dag / phra ba'i lha yang grub pa thob //
T15TD4344E:156a-13: bya ba thams cad yongs spongs la //
T15TD4344E:156a-14: sngags kyi bya ba sgrub par gyis //
T15TD4344E:156a-15: zhes gsungs nas po ta lar gshegs skad /
T15TD4344E:156a-16: su kha de bas grub pa thob pa /
T15TD4344E:156a-17: pandi ta bi na ya shr'is bsgyur ba'o /
